title: Installation issue: xsdk@0.4.0
body:
Using `develop` from today, [dabf4f1](https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/dabf4f17d3fe287bba010f41b1c05791bac4f4b6), I cannot concretize the `xsdk` spec at version `0.4.0`.  Instead of successful concretization, I get an unsatisfiable variant constraint.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec xsdk@0.4.0
Input spec
--------------------------------
xsdk@0.4.0

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    metis@5.1.0%gcc@7.3.0 build_type=Release ~gdb~int64~real64+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    dealii@9.0.1~assimp~doc~gmsh+hdf5~int64+metis+mpi~netcdf+petsc~python~slepc+trilinos


dealii requires metis variant +real64, but spec asked for ~real64
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux 90101467f7c6 4.4.0-141-generic #167-Ubuntu SMP Wed Dec 5 10:40:15 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/lsb-release 
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=18.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=bionic
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS"
``` 
Here's the contents of my `compilers.yaml`:

```commandline
$ cat ~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml 
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/clang
      cxx: /usr/bin/clang++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: clang@6.0.0-1ubuntu2
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc-5
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++-5
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran-5
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran-5
    spec: gcc@5.5.0
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@7.3.0
    target: x86_64
```
